page.title: 13MILFORD FACILITIES
page.content: Most facilities are based on tourism. Facing the Common,the Barley Mow pub serves drinks and has a large restaurant.On the Brocton Road next to the information centre,the Little Fawn restaurant provides meals and a take-away service. A Wimpy bar is open all year except Christmas day ,serving takeaway meals of hamburgers,chips and ice cream etc. Other businesses include an electrical shop,post office/shop and a firm which repairs lorries and hires out mini- skips for waste rubbish disposal. Along the Milford Road is a general store, owned by an Asian man with poor English. Inside it is very crowded with a strong odour of vegtables,such as cabbage,peppers and onions.They sell sweets like Twix,Mars,Galaxy,Revels and Maltesers,also newspapers.There is an off-licence and they even rent videos.
